name: Spot the Number - Find the Digit in City,spots
name_original: Spot the Number - Find the Digit in City,spots
description:
Will you uncover them all?

Spot the Number is a classic casual game for children and adults alike. The goal is simple: Search and Discover all the Numbers (Digit) you can find in the scenery.

Each time you spot a number, just tap on the screen. Be careful, if you do not tap the right spot, your precious time will be reduced.

Each picture included in the game is composed of a really large set of elements. The more you play, the more coins you will accumulate giving you access to additional set of HD graphics pictures to retrieve. The game also include 20 scenes! They are beautiful pictures all around the world.

Hours of fun ahead. Spot the Number is a great way to train your brain and improve your observation skills. Download it today for free.

The game is tablet ready.
